movies.title: Cars 3
movies.movieSummary: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.movieSummary: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

movies.title: Shrek 2
movies.movieSummary: Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.

movies.title: Shrek the Third
movies.movieSummary: Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'Ã©tat by the jilted Prince Charming.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.movieSummary: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: Inception
movies.movieSummary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.movieSummary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.movieSummary: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

movies.title: Joker
movies.movieSummary: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

movies.title: Fast & Furious
movies.movieSummary: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

movies.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
movies.movieSummary: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

movies.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
movies.movieSummary: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

movies.title: Fast Five
movies.movieSummary: Dominic Toretto and his team of street racers plan
